content: I am generally happy with this PR, but I would like to get a second opinion on whether the 'lots of variables' approach is ok. I am usually not too fond of it, but here it might be still alright.
I agree, I think sectioning based on typeclass strength would be a better bet here
The 'lots of variables' approach is good for when reordering the lemmas would create thousands of lines of diff, but here it looks like only a handful of lemmas would move
